nodes.text: Bev was a male Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul living during the war against Zakuul. By the time Empress Vaylin took the Eternal Throne, Bev was working in the beast dens of the Royal Palace of the Eternal Dragon under Beast master Oleg. During the Grand Festival of Empress Vaylin in 3630 BBY Oleg scolded Bev for letting Bergola get sick, to which Bev tried to exaplin that the Exoboar wouldn't eat the medicine. Vaylin's speech was interrupted by the arrival of first the Alliance Commander and then former Emperor Arcann. In an effort to kill them both, Vaylin ordered the Eternal Fleet to bomb the Palace into rubble, regardless of her supporters still inside.
Bev appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VI: The Dragon's Maw".
